nav.description: Full Stack Developer passionate about creating exceptional user experiences

about.title: About Me
paragraphs: Full Stack Developer with 3+ years of experience, I design performant and user-friendly web applications. My expertise covers React, Vue.js, Next.js on the front-end, as well as Node.js and Firebase on the back-end.

I have developed various solutions: musical coaching platforms, ticketing systems, ERPs and mobile applications. This diverse experience has given me strong adaptability and a pragmatic approach to development.

As an independent consultant, I support my clients in their digitalization projects. I master API integrations (Stripe, Firebase), REST architecture and modern development standards. My added value: transforming complex needs into elegant technical solutions.
Outside of coding, I practice karate and motorcycling to maintain a good work-life balance.

list.title: Full Stack Developer - Permanent
list.description: Development within a leading European DataScience company. Front-end integration via mock-ups, robust back-end API development, test writing, and creation of a UI/UX library to ensure user interface consistency.

list.title: Lead Full Stack Developer - Freelance
list.description: Development of various freelance projects: custom crypto wallet, ticketing systems, blockchain application refactoring, ERP improvements. Expertise in Next.js, React, Node.js, and third-party API integrations (Stripe, Web3, Firebase).

list.title: Lead Full Stack Developer - Freelance
list.description: Development of the musical coaching platform for independent artists. First mission: development of the coaching part with Angular/MongoDB/Firebase. Second mission: complete refactoring in Next.js from scratch with migration from the old stack.

list.title: Lead Full Stack Developer - Freelance
list.description: Complete refactoring of the blockchain application with creation of an administration interface communicating with smart contracts. Modern architecture and optimized user interface for token and transaction management.

list.title: Lead Full Stack Developer - Freelance
list.description: Development of a complete ticketing system for dance show. Stripe API integration for payments, automatic QR code generation, email sending with PDF tickets, and administration interface.

list.title: Full Stack Developer - Permanent
list.description: Development of a planning management application. Interface implementation from Figma mockups, back-end API development and PostgreSQL database integration.

list.title: Lead Full Stack Developer - Freelance
list.description: Improvement and development of new features on an existing PHP ERP. Addition of custom modules according to client needs, performance optimization and user interface refactoring.

list.title: Lead Full Stack Developer - Freelance
list.description: Development of a custom crypto wallet application for private client. Creation of an interface similar to Metamask but adapted to the client's specific needs, with secure private key management and blockchain integration.

list.title: App Rewiring
list.description: PWA for tracking personal development habits. From scratch development including UX/UI design, full-stack development and deployment as Progressive Web App. Modern and intuitive interface for daily habit tracking.

list.title: HeureCivique
list.description: Civic initiative from the creator of the Neighbors' Day. Mobile application for the 17th arrondissement of Paris city hall allowing administrations to add missions and volunteers to register easily.
